Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
1. "CSS Wrapper" has the be the 2nd setting behind "Hide headline"

2. Rename "Hide title" to "Hide headline"

3. Remove the following icons from the default (to keep the list short)

  • lightbulb
  • archive
  • angle left
  • word file
  • tag

4. Add the following icons to the settings default configuration:

  • link-external as "Link external 1" 
  • link-external-square as "Link external 2" 
  • globe as "Globe"
  • arrow-right as "Arrow"
  • folder-o as "Folder"
  • Remane "Download" as "Download 1"
  • add icon "download-cloud" as "Download 2"
  • Replace the icon for "file" with "file-text-o" and rename to "Document"
